alert.note: Alert for Garland; Grant; Hot Spring; Perry; Pulaski; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 1:40PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Perry, northwestern Grant, eastern Garland, Saline, northeastern Hot Spring and central Pulaski Counties through 230 PM CDT... At 138 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hot Springs Village, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. These winds may create very dangerous crosswind conditions for airports included in the advisory, including Little Rock National Airport. Locations impacted include... Little Rock... North Little Rock... Hot Springs... Benton... Sherwood... West Little Rock... Maumelle... Bryant... Hot Springs Village... Malvern... Downtown Little Rock... Perryville... Southwest Little Rock... Haskell... Shannon Hills... Wrightsville... Argenta... Rockport... Traskwood... Tull... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CDT for central and southwestern Arkansas.

area.areaDesc: Garland; Grant; Hot Spring; Perry; Pulaski; Saline
